Disable Filter:
Field.Description: Remove filter from Heat Sources device list.

Field.Label: ^ Check to disable Heat Sources device filter in order to list devices that aren't "officially" supported by the plugin but may work!

^ Specify the name of the Indigo folder in which the plugin will list any pre-defined Heat Source variables when editing a TRV device. Leave empty if the folder is not required. The default variable folder is 'TRV' and if required and missing, will be created.

Field.tooltip: Select Queue Delay time from list.
Field.Label: Queue Delay:

^ Specify the length of time you want between any single status request across all TRVs. The aim being to prevent a Z-Wave flood of status requests at the same time. Select No Delay [Default] to not use this feature.

Field.tooltip: Select Queue Delay time from list.
Field.Label: Queue Delay [Spirit Valve]:

^ Specify a different length of delay time you want between any single status request for a Spirit Valve across all TRVs if Queue Delay has a delay specified. This should be much less than the Queue Delay. Select 'As Queue Delay Value' [Default] to not use this feature.
Enable Standard CSV:
Field.Description: Create and update CSV files on state change.

Field.Label: Enable PostgreSQL CSV:
Field.Description: Create and update CSV files on demand using PostgreSQL.

Field.Label: ^ Specify the path to the folder which will contain any created CSV files specified for a TRV device.
^ Specify a prefix to be prepended to the CSV file name created from the TRV device specified 'Short Name' and state name
